title: claude-hovercraft executeClaudeCode Command Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of claude-hovercraft. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the implementation of the executeClaudeCode method. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to execute a system call. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the service account.
timeline:
2025-10-06 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2026-02-25 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2026-02-25 - Advisory Updated
